custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT (*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM pml_edm_loaivanbannoibo WHERE (lower(kyHieuLoaiVanBanNoiBo) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(tenLoaiVanBanNoiBo) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])

SELECT * FROM pml_edm_loaivanbannoibo WHERE (lower(kyHieuLoaiVanBanNoiBo) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(tenLoaiVanBanNoiBo) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ORDER BY kyHieuLoaiVanBanNoiBo ASC
